product_name: First Aid BeautyTravel Size Ultra Repair Cream Intense Hydration
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackHSA/FSA eligibleFirst Aid Beauty's Ultra Repair cream instantly relieves dry, distressed skin + eczema, plus strengthens skin barrier in 7 days for calm, comfortable skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsAward-winning, rich hydrating formula quickly absorbs with no greasy after-feelSkin feels comfortable after just one use24 hours of soothing hydrationTreats eczema + speeds up skin renewal to strengthen surface barrier for long-term reliefMade with Colloidal Oatmeal, a skin protectant and barrier-building ingredientSafe for sensitive skin and good for face + bodyNon-comedogenicKey IngredientsColloidal Oatmeal (OTC): Treats eczema + improves skin renewal for stronger skin barrierShea Butter: Moisturizes and protects the skin barrierAllantoin: Calms and soothes skinResearch ResultsClinically proven to strengthen skin barrier in 7 days*In an independent clinical study with 21 participants:More than 2x immediate increase in skin hydration***In a consumer perception study with 21 participants after 2 weeks:100% reported the product helped soothe, moisturize, and condition skin**Item 2559167How To UseApply as needed.IngredientsActive: Colloidal Oatmeal 0.5%.Inactive: Water, Stearic Acid, Glycerin, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glyceryl Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Cetearyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Dimethicone, Squalane, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Allantoin, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA, Chrysanthemum Parthenium (Feverfew) Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Ceramide NP, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

reviews.headline: This is my go-to
reviews.comments: This is the best for your hands! I slather on at night before I go to bed and in the morning my hands are so soft. Its been helping with my nails and cuticles too. I also like that it has no smell on my hands but they do make some scents that are very light also and I put on legs and arms. Been using this lotion for over 10 years!

reviews.headline: Perfect for dry skin!
reviews.comments: Randomly chose this as my birthday gift and I am so glad! I have super dry skin, specifically my hands, and live in Arizona so I've tried anything highly rated from O'keeffes to actual beef tallow, but this is the first lotion to actually help with the dryness. I still apply multiple times a day, but it keeps my skin hydrated in between.

reviews.headline: miracle worker!
reviews.comments: got this as my free birthday gift and it is MAGIC! ive had stubborn eczema on my hand for years now and this is the first thing that has actually helped it. so calming and this is the first time ive seen my hand without irritation in ages :) thank you first aid beauty!!

reviews.headline: Great for Psoriasis on Elbows
reviews.comments: I needed something for the psoriasis on my elbows when I travel and this cream has been working wonders!

reviews.headline: Helped with rosascea!
reviews.comments: I have rosacea and perioral dermatitis around my nose, mouth and chin. This helped clear that up in about a week. My skin feels very hydrated and much happier.

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: Great moisturizer!

reviews.headline: This works wonders!
reviews.comments: I have cancer and I get radiation treatments 5 days a week. By week 5 my underbelly was super bright red. It looked exactly like the time I sat in the sun all day every day for two weeks straight in Hawaii when I was 15 years old. Quite a nasty sunburn but this one didn't hurt. The nurses told me to use Aquaphor, but 3 days of Aquaphor did nothing at all, so I bought this hoping it would do something better than nothing. I slept with it overnight and the morning after it was half as red and looking really good. I now have a newfound respect for Oatmeal as an active ingredient.

reviews.headline: NEW FORMULA CAUSES ITCHING!!!
reviews.comments: I have been using this for years but since they changed the formula I developed a rash around my eyes and rashes on my face. I opened a new tube and within a few hours of using my skin burned and felt like tickling on my face. Definitely not for senitive skin!!!

reviews.headline: NEW FORMULA CAUSES ITCHING!!!
reviews.comments: I have been using this for years but since they changed the formula I developed a rash around my eyes and rashes on my face. I opened a new tube and within a few hours of using my skin burned and felt like tickling on my face. Definitely not for senitive skin!!!

reviews.headline: Hydration
reviews.comments: First aid beauty is a great line of products.  Hydrates my dry skin and isn't greasy. My skin just drinks it in. I love the travel size to keep in my purse.

reviews.headline: Great for travel
reviews.comments: Good product especially for those warmer locations for vaca's. perfect size for travel.

reviews.headline: Perfect moisturizer for day or night. Good on mature skin..
reviews.comments: I originally received this product as a Christmas gift. I immediately loved the texture and creaminess and the way it kept my face moist all day. My foundation wears well over it. It can serve as a night cream if you wish.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: I'm glad the Ulta consultant suggested this product

reviews.headline: My Favorite
reviews.comments: Let me just say, I have used a lot of different moisturizers. Out of all of the ones I've tried so far, this is the best. I have sensitive skin and don't usually struggle with bad acne, but I'm prone to break outs and flaky, dry skin (especially during the fall & winter months). So I've started using this and it actually works! It has totally helped to calm my breakouts and any redness I struggle with and has helped my skin feel smoother, gives it a glow, and just look better overall. It actually does what a moisturizer is supposed to do - moisturize!! It's very thick and feels a little wet and watery when you first apply. But after it dries, my skin literally feels so soft and stays moist all day long. I love it! And the fact that it's actually created to be safe for sensitive skin is a huge bonus for me and is exactly what I look for in skincare products. For those of you with sensitive skin who are looking for a great moisturizer, I highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Wanted to Like but It Irritated My Skin
reviews.comments: Did a test patch & immediately I felt a burning, stinging sensation. Washed it off but my face was irritated the rest of the day. I suspect it was the Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil I reacted to.

reviews.headline: This One Is a No
reviews.comments: I bought this and did a small test patch. Maybe it's the menthol but it burned & my skin turned red. I immediately washed my face but it was irritated the rest of that day. Thankfully, it was back to normal the next morning.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: A good moisturizer and primer.  I love the fact that it is fragrance free , clean and great on sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: Very hydrating; however, it did start pilling the first few days I used it.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: This is very good product. Iam allergy to sun and break out  from it.in a rash. But this  really helps me when I get the rash.

reviews.headline: Eucalyptus oil is not fun
reviews.comments: REALLY wish theu would wliminate the eucalyptus oil in this â€¦ burns my skin. Used to use this all through my 20s and early 30s and then I hit menopause and my skin becase sensitive to essential oils and sadly eucalyptus is one of the worst for me.

media.headline: Helped clear my allergic reaction up fast!
media.caption: My neck with the reaction

media.headline: Helped clear my allergic reaction up fast!
media.caption: The redness and bumps from the reaction

media.headline: Helped clear my allergic reaction up fast!
media.caption: Today with almost 100% free and clear skin

faceoff_positive.comments:
Despite having combination skin, it is not uncommon for my to get dry patches on my face during winter. The dry patches are mainly on my eyelid and near my chin and mouth area.  No product seemed to be helping this year until I decided to give First Aid Beauty a try. I remember Hyram talking about using them if your skin was really dry and that it wouldn't break you out. So I thought why not because you've tried everything else it seems.

This product is on the pricey side  however, my dry patches are gone and my face is well moisturized but not overly oily/greasy. My skin responds really well to this product and will continue to use it through the winter season. I don't mind spending a little more for a product that really works, I say it's worth the price.

I really recommend this product to anyone who is having dry skin issues; dry patches, eczema, etc.
faceoff_positive.headline: Really great for dry skin

faceoff_negative.comments: I purchased this cream in travel size, because of the highly acclaimed rescue the skin promotion! It absorbs quickly, but had a menthol scent to it. Looking at the ingredients, i was mortified to see more warnings about the use of this wonder cream. Dont get it in your eyes, keep away from children and so on. My husband is a disabled veteran and his back is always dry and irritated. I applied the cream and a few minutes later, he told me his skin feels dry and was painfully red. I washed his back asap and applied his proven good treatment oil and cream. Since i bought only the travel size, i will put it in the trash. This cream is by far not recommended for sensitive skin, individual with serious skin issues. The smell of menthol is the first indication, something is off. Lesson learned and i stay with clean cosmetics!
faceoff_negative.headline: Ultra Repair Cream!

rollup.name: Travel Size Ultra Repair Cream Intense Hydration
